verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus,
Let Your kingdom come here
Let Your will be done here,
in us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus,
there is no one greater
You alone are savior
Show the world Your love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
King of Heaven, come down
King of Heaven, come now
Let Your glory reign
Shining like the day
King of Heaven, come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
King of Heaven, rise up
Who can stand against us?
You are strong to save
In Your mighty name
King of Heaven, come

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We are,
Children of Your mercy
Rescued for Your glory
We cry Jesus,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Set our hearts towards You
That every eye would see You
Lifted high.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
King of Heaven, come down
King of Heaven, come now
Let Your glory reign
Shining like the day
King of Heaven, come

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
King of Heaven, rise up
Who can stand against us?
You are stong to save
In your mighty name
King of Heaven come

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
King of Heaven come
King of Heaven come.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
King of Heaven come down
King of Heaven come now
Let Your glory reign
Shining like the day
King of Heaven come
